casebody.data:
No. 10-9000. Ronald Lewis, Petitioner v. Michelle R. Ricci, Administrator, New Jersey State Prison, et al. 564 U.S. 1050, 131 S. Ct. 3085,

180 L. Ed. 2d 907,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4966. June 27, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 563 U.S. 943, 131 S. Ct. 2108, 179 L. Ed. 2d 904, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 3139.
